subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ji-Yai Shin, a 20-year-old South Korean, shot a five-under-par 67 on to take the first-day lead in the Samsung World Championship in Half Moon Bay, Calif., topping Paula Creamer’s 68 that featured a birdie on No. 17.
snippet: Ji-Yai Shin, a 20-year-old South Korean, shot a five-under-par 67 on to take the first-day lead in the Samsung World Championship in Half Moon Bay, Calif., topping Paula Creamer’s 68 that featured a birdie on No. 17.
